header.gameNote: NEW YORK LIFE ACC MEN'S TOURNAMENT - SEMIFINAL

videos.description: Defense turns into offense as David Skara sinks the layup despite the contact.
videos.headline: Clemson's Skara gets the and-1 layup to go

videos.description: Kyle Guy gets out on the break and throws it down, then turns to the bench and says, 'That's a dunk!'
videos.headline: UVA's Guy proves he can dunk

videos.description: Kyle Guy comes off a screen and nails the three-pointer to give UVA 16 unanswered points.
videos.headline: Guy drains the smooth triple

videos.description: UVA Coach Tony Bennett was not happy with how his defense started the game and wants them to guard the paint better.
videos.headline: Bennett wants his defense to be aggressive

videos.description: UVA's defense steps up again and Ty Jerome makes a nice dish to Kyle Guy who drains the deep jumper.
videos.headline: Another UVA steal leads to a Guy bucket

videos.description: Clemson's Marcquise Reed makes a nice move under the rim for the tough bucket.
videos.headline: Reed finishes the reverse lay-in

videos.description: UVA's Ty Jerome uses a slick handle to free space and drill the jump shot as the shot clock expires.
videos.headline: Jerome's smooth crossover leads to open jumper

videos.description: Kyle Guy says Virginia wants to win the ACC tournament championship, but his squad wants to end with a national title in San Antonio.
videos.headline: Guy says UVA is chasing bigger things than ACC title
